tasks.name: Site Preparation
tasks.description: Clear the site of vegetation, debris, and other obstructions. Establish site boundaries and levels, set up site services. Prepare for initial site inspections.
tasks.quality_control_requirements: Verify that site has been cleared and properly leveled. Confirm that all necessary utilities and site services are properly installed.

tasks.name: Foundation Excavation
tasks.description: Excavation for the foundation according to specified depth and dimensions following engineering plans.
tasks.quality_control_requirements: Ensure depth and dimensions meet structural requirements as per the engineering drawings.

tasks.name: Foundation Construction
tasks.description: Lay down and secure the rebar framework, followed by concrete pouring to form the foundation.
tasks.quality_control_requirements: Ensure all reinforcement bars are securely tied and concrete is vibrated properly to avoid air gaps.

tasks.name: Structural Wall Construction
tasks.description: Build external and internal walls using bricks and blocks. Includes setting up door and window frames.
tasks.quality_control_requirements: Check that all walls are vertical and level with correct dimensions and openings for doors and windows.

tasks.name: Roof Framing and Covering
tasks.description: Construct the roof frame using timber, followed by roofing materials to cover the structure securely.
tasks.quality_control_requirements: Ensure that the roof frame is structurally sound and the roofing material is properly installed and waterproof.

tasks.name: Plumbing Installation
tasks.description: Install all pipes and fittings for water distribution and waste removal throughout the house.
tasks.quality_control_requirements: All piping must be pressure tested for leaks and comply with local building codes.

tasks.name: Electrical Installation
tasks.description: Install all necessary wiring, outlets, and switches for the electrical supply throughout the house.
tasks.quality_control_requirements: Ensure compliance with electrical safety standards and building codes. Testing for correct functioning and safety.

tasks.name: Interior Wall Painting
tasks.description: Apply paint to the interior walls in various rooms according to color schemes and paint types specified.
tasks.quality_control_requirements: Check for consistent paint coverage, correct color matching, and neat finishes around edges.

tasks.name: Flooring Installation
tasks.description: Install different types of flooring materials in specified rooms including ceramic preparation and fitting.
tasks.quality_control_requirements: Floors must be level and properly aligned. Tiles should be evenly spaced and securely set.

tasks.name: Fixture and Cabinet Installation
tasks.description: Install all kitchen cabinets, bathroom fixtures, and fittings.
tasks.quality_control_requirements: Inspect installations for secure fitting and proper function. Ensure all cabinets and fixtures are level and properly aligned.

tasks.name: Final Inspection and Cleanup
tasks.description: Perform final inspections to comply with local regulations. Final cleanup of the construction site.
tasks.quality_control_requirements: Ensure the building meets all local building codes and regulatory requirements. Prepare and clear the site for occupancy.
